author: Meaghan Dorman
description: A honeyed Whisky Sour with allspice and a rich cherry base.
name: Wildest Redhead
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large chunk/cube ice)
DRIZZLE cherry brandy (which will fall through the cocktail to form a red base to the drink)
